scripts.test:acceptance: dotenvx run --env TESTS=true -f .env.test -- wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --suite acceptance
scripts.test:externalStubs: dotenvx run --env TESTS=true -f .env.test -- wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --suite externalStubs
scripts.test:externalReal: dotenvx run --env TESTS=true -f .env.test -- wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --suite externalReal --suite externalThemeReal
